actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House to the First Resolving Clause by Yea-Nay Vote: 352 - 34 (Record Vote No: 34).
Resolution Agreed to in House to the Second Resolving Clause by Yea-Nay Vote: 345-50 (Record Vote No: 35).

official_title: A resolution to certify the contempt report regarding Ralph Bernstein and Joseph Bernstein.

summary.text: Requires the Speaker of the House of Representatives to certify the contempt report of the House Committee on Foreign Affairs regarding Ralph Bernstein and Joseph Bernstein to the U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia so that legal action against them may proceed.

titles.title: A resolution to certify the contempt report regarding Ralph Bernstein and Joseph Bernstein.
